documentation.punchline: The definitive charting library with easy integration

section.p: This is the wrapper around the HighCharts.
Basic example of usage is this:
Here's all configuration properties which you can set for TbHighCharts.

property.name: options
property.p: This is the array of properties to be passed to the highcharts library. See HighCharts library documentation for list of all configuration settings which can be set.

property.name: htmlOptions
property.p: Traditional Yii property to set HTML attributes to the container tag for the chart. It will be plain <div> element which HighCharts will be attached to.
Please note that the HTML ID attribute will be generated automatically, so don't set it using htmlOptions.
